MeldCX OS Version Control

meldCX - The best way to build and deploy commercial apps. 

meldCX’s Chrome Version Pinning Application is a device application built for businesses to manage their commercial kiosk devices.
 
The Version Pinning Application harnesses the power of both Chrome and our own web-based APIs to control the chromeOS version. This ensures complete control over the OS version when both kiosk application and the device are unavailable.

The Chrome Version Pinning Application compliments our product suite. 

Our web-based APIs change the way companies develop, deploy and manage apps on commercial devices. 

If you have any questions about this application, meldCX and/or AgentM, please see our support page: https://meldcx.zendesk.com/hc/en-us

If you want to learn more about this application, meldCX and/or AgentM, email sales@meldcx.com or visit our website (meldcx.com) to book a demo. 


What’s new in Chrome Version Pinning Appliction v1.0.166?

- Supports pinning of chromeOS version 67 (10575)
